comment: I was skeptical at first being that I work on clinical trials for drugs + I see how long it takes for drugs to be approved, but I realized that a lot of it is due to nonefficiency w IRB boards, the sponsor, coordinators etc.. this developed so fast bc of the effort+collaboration
